00071 #if !defined(_ICCAPPLYBPC_H)
00072 #define _ICCAPPLYBPC_H
00073 
00074 #include "IccCmm.h"
00075 
00076 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00077 namespace sampleICC {
00078 #endif
00079 
00088 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccApplyBPCHint : public CIccCreateAdjustPCSXformHint
00089 {
00090 public:
00091         virtual const char *GetAdjustPCSType() const { return "CIccApplyBPCHint"; }
00092         virtual IIccAdjustPCSXform* GetNewAdjustPCSXform() const;
00093 };
00094 
00104 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccApplyBPC : public IIccAdjustPCSXform
00105 {
00106 public: 
00107         // virtual IIccAdjustPCSXform functions
00108         // does all the calculations for BPC and returns the scale and offset in the arguments passed
00109   virtual bool CalcFactors(const CIccProfile* pProfile, const CIccXform* pXfm, icFloatNumber* Scale, icFloatNumber* Offset) const;
00110 
00111 protected:
00112         // utility functions
00113         void lab2pcs(icFloatNumber* pixel, const CIccProfile* pProfile) const;
00114         void pcs2lab(icFloatNumber* pixel, const CIccProfile* pProfile) const;
00115         icFloatNumber calcsum(icFloatNumber* x, icFloatNumber* y, int n, int j, int k) const;
00116         icFloatNumber calcQuadraticVertex(icFloatNumber* x, icFloatNumber* y, int n) const;
00117 
00118         // worker functions
00119         virtual bool calcBlackPoint(const CIccProfile* pProfile, const CIccXform* pXform, icFloatNumber* XYZb) const;
00120         bool calcSrcBlackPoint(const CIccProfile* pProfile, const CIccXform* pXform, icFloatNumber* XYZb) const;
00121         bool calcDstBlackPoint(const CIccProfile* pProfile, const CIccXform* pXform, icFloatNumber* XYZb) const;
00122 
00123         bool pixelXfm(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icColorSpaceSignature SrcSpace, 
00124                                                                 icRenderingIntent nIntent, icXformInterp nInterp, const CIccProfile *pProfile) const;
00125 
00126         // PCS -> PCS round trip transform, always uses relative intent on the device -> pcs transform
00127         CIccCmm* getBlackXfm(icRenderingIntent nIntent, icXformInterp nInterp, const CIccProfile *pProfile) const;
00128 };
00129
